subject: Broken Cable
description_text:
Hello,

My cable of the Simsonn Pro pedal is broken and I need to replace it. It's
the cable coming from the throttle pedal.
Do you sell those as a replacement or do I need to solder it myself? If so
can you give me a wiring plan for this cable?


Best,

Nic

conversations.body_text: Hi Nic Heese,  Could you please take a photo and send it to me so I can check exactly where it is broken?Â
